ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.

ul.li: Strong knowledge of software development in C
Experience with sensor components such as cameras, laser scanners and GPS/IMU positioning systems
Knowledge of computer vision, sensor fusion and image processing
Creative, pragmatic, critical thinking and troubleshooting skills

div.p: The 3D Vision team at Apple is looking for a talented engineer to work with sensor system design and processing of collected sensor data for aerial, ground and portable sensor platforms. The work is a unique combination of software development and hands-on hardware component integration, involving direct interaction with multiple other teams such as field operations, infrastructure, computer vision and machine learning. As a member of this fast-paced and result oriented team, you will participate in all phases of product development; product definition, design, implementation, debugging and testing.
Master of Science in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Physics or equivalent.
